AI Description: LIKWID is a performance analysis tool suite designed to support HPC/PCP (performance counter profiling) on Intel and AMD processors. It offers a set of command-line tools and libraries that facilitate the collection of performance data and analysis on modern hardware architectures.
Core Features: Supports Performance Counter Profiling On Intel & Amd Processors, Command-Line Tools For Gathering Performance Data, Libraries For Accessing Hardware Performance Counters, Advanced Analysis & Visualization Capabilities
General Tags: Performance Analysis, Hpc, Performance Counter Profiling, Hardware Performance Counters
